# Expense Tracker with Data Visualization

A Python desktop application to track daily expenses and automatically generate visual spending insights.

## Features

* Add and categorize expenses
* Persistent storage using CSV
* Interactive table view using Tkinter
* Auto-generated Pie Chart & Bar Chart using Matplotlib
* Lightweight, no database required

## Tech Stack

* Python
* Tkinter (GUI)
* Matplotlib (Data Visualization)
* CSV (Data Storage)

## How to Run

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
python expense_tracker.py
```

## Screenshots

Tracks spending and generates category-wise analytics charts.

## Learning Outcomes

* Event-driven programming
* Data aggregation & structuring

  
* Visualization storytelling
* Building real-world desktop tools
